backend/main.mo: Defines actor with extensive domain types for media, users, ads, wallets, approvals, affiliates, and storage mixins but contains no business logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking feature requests to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing frontend file purposes, routing, UI components, styles, and background image usage.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark theme CSS variables and global background/foreground utilities.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining root container, metadata, and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router configuration wiring all public and admin pages, wrapping every /admin/* route with AdminRouteGuard.
frontend/src/components/AdBanner.tsx: Displays a single active banner ad, auto-tracking views and clicks, and opening target URLs.
frontend/src/components/AdminAccessDenie: UI card shown when a non-admin user attempts to access admin pages, offering navigation back to home.
Wraps children with admin-auth logic, showing a loading state or access denied based on identity and admin status.
frontend/src/components/AdSidebar.tsx: Displays up to three active sidebar ads and tracks impressions and clicks for each one.
Renders a grid of category cards that navigate to a category-specific page when clicked.
frontend/src/components/ChatRoomComponen: Implements a chat UI with polling, message sending, file uploads, and auto-scrolling.
frontend/src/components/ContentCard.tsx: Displays a media item with title, stats, type badge, and hover-to-play overlay.
frontend/src/components/ContentGrid.tsx: Shows tabbed lists of all and popular content and opens a player when an item is selected.
frontend/src/components/ContentPlayer.ts: Modal player for video, audio, or image content with controls, rating, and metadata.
frontend/src/components/DisplayScreen.ts: Shows the currently active display content with video playback and content metadata.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with navigation links, social icons, branding, and optional admin login button.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Provides the main site header with navigation, search, authentication controls, and an admin menu using routing and identity hooks.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Renders the homepage hero section with animated visuals and buttons linking to streaming and wallet sections.
frontend/src/components/HeroHelper.tsx: Implements an interactive assistant with chat, voice recognition, speech synthesis, and persistent user memory.
frontend/src/components/JitsiMeetIntegra: Integrates Jitsi Meet for live video conferencing with room setup, participant tracking, and UI controls.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Defines the global page layout with dynamic backgrounds, header, footer, routed content, and the HeroHelper widget.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Displays a simple modal for entering a user name and simulating profile creation.
frontend/src/components/SharedPlaybackCo: Shows a shared playback feature placeholder with controls for starting playback and creating a room.
frontend/src/components/VideoCallCompone: UI component for a mock video call interface with mute, video toggle, and end-call actions.
frontend/src/components/WAN22Integration: Interface for creating AI-generated media projects, simulating WAN 2.2 API calls and managing project state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity, with automatic query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, and persistent identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for admin checks and media-related CRUD operations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme colors, typography, layout constraints, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AdminAdsPage.tsx: Provides a UI for creating, listing, toggling, and deleting advertisements with form handling and CTR calculation.
frontend/src/pages/AdminAffiliatePage.ts: Displays and manages affiliate tiers, including creating new tiers through a dialog form.
frontend/src/pages/AdminApprovalPage.tsx: Aggregates and displays multiple types of pending administrative approvals with actions to approve or reject each.
frontend/src/pages/AdminContentPage.tsx: Allows uploading, listing, and deleting multimedia content with progress tracking and category selection.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDisplayPage.tsx: Manages theater display content, showing the currently active item and enabling upload of new display content.
Displays pending content submissions with search, approve/reject, and delete actions using various admin mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/AdminHiiYahChatPage.t: Manages pending broadcast and Hero join requests with approve/reject controls in a tabbed admin interface.
frontend/src/pages/AdminImageLibraryPage: Handles image upload, approval, rejection, download, and library management with progress tracking and tabbed views.
frontend/src/pages/AdminInviteAcceptPage: Processes admin invite redemption, handling login flow, token validation, and success/error states.
Generates, lists, and copies admin invite codes while distinguishing available and used codes.
frontend/src/pages/AdminMallPage.tsx: Admin UI for creating, editing, and deleting mall items with local state management and basic inventory stats.
frontend/src/pages/AdminMediaUploadRoomP: Admin page for uploading media, tracking upload progress, and viewing categorized media content.
frontend/src/pages/AdminMemberDirectoryP: Displays user directory with search and role filters, loading all profiles via actor query.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPriceControlRoom: Admin interface for updating subscription, content, and mall pricing with tabbed categories and save actions.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPricingTermsPage: Page for admins to edit pricing plans and manage terms and conditions, including loading and saving active terms.
frontend/src/pages/AdminWalletManagement: Admin dashboard displaying wallet recovery seeds with search, visibility toggling, copying, and mock BTC monitoring charts.
frontend/src/pages/AffiliateDashboardPag: Affiliate dashboard for generating, copying, and viewing referral links along with tier-based statistics.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryPage.tsx: Category view that fetches and displays media content by category with selectable playback modal.
frontend/src/pages/CreditCardPage.tsx: UI for viewing a mock Excalibur credit card and entering amounts, with basic validation and identity gating.
Workspace hub featuring tabs for overview, Jitsi integration, WAN 2.2 tools, and project management.
frontend/src/pages/FlixiodTestPage.tsx: Test page embedding Flixiod streaming for previewing movie/TV playback and opening the service externally.
frontend/src/pages/HiiYahChatPage.tsx: Chat page with authentication check, placeholder connection features, and UI for chat rooms, calls, and shared playback.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home landing page displaying featured sections, introduction text, and financial services showcase.
frontend/src/pages/IHeartRadioTestPage.t: Test page embedding iHeartRadio player with navigation, alerts, and external link options.
frontend/src/pages/MallPage.tsx: Mall page with search input and a placeholder card indicating the shopping feature is coming soon.
frontend/src/pages/SignUpPage.tsx: User registration form handling validation, submission, and post-submission confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/StreamingPartnersPage: Lists streaming partners with navigation to test integrations and links to external platforms.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Renders the Terms and Conditions page, fetching active terms and displaying either the content, a loading state, or a fallback message. Includes navigation back to home and formatted version/date info.
frontend/src/pages/WalletPage.tsx: Implements the wallet dashboard with identityâ€‘based wallet address setup, wallet creation/migration, balance and transaction display, and utility functions like copying, formatting, and transaction labeling.
frontend/src/types/backend-extended.ts: Defines extended frontend TypeScript interfaces mirroring expected backend data structures, including media, transactions, user requests, ads, wallet info, and terms types.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning parameters from hash-based routes. Supports maintaining state like admin tokens across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, animations, shadows, and container settings, enabling theme extensions and plugin integration for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project state metadata including known issues, required image assets, and a list of feature requirements tied to app authorization, navigation, layout fixes, and build reliability.
